subject: Order confirmation
description_text:
Hi,
I have placed an order with confirmation no T4JFN8CN2
I did not receive any confirmation text and i tried through order checking, but not avail.
Pls assist to confirm my order.
Yahoo Mail: Search, organise, conquer

conversations.body_text: Hi James Lim,    As you did not provide an email address, you did not receive the order confirmation. I have now added your email address and sent the dispatch notification. Please confirm receipt.
